modName: Hedge Knight by hothtrooper44 Without Robe including Normal Map Fix
summary: Hedge Knight armour from hothtrooper44 without the robe (male version only), including fixes to the normal and specular map for the crest on the chest (fixes also useable with original or retextured versions of the armour).
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: 

Changelog
v1.2
- the ingame item version (droppable) now comes without the robe as well

v1.3
- small adjustments to the cuirass mesh to ensure the shader reflections match the rest of the armour

This mod contains a version of the Hedge Knight armour (male) by hothtrooper44 without the robe. It also fixes the normal map and specular map for the crest on the chest. The relief of the original normal map as well as the specular map textures did not match the smaller crest on the chestplate.

It is also possible to use the fixed normal/specular maps with the original version of the mod.

The original version of the mod is required and can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13961//?

Installation:

1. Install the original Hedge Knight Armour from http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13961//? first.
2. Copy the contents of the \"meshes\" and \"textures\" folders into your \"data\" folder.
3. Enjoy.

Using the fixed normal map/specular map with the original mod:

1. Install the original Hedge Knight Armour from http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13961//? first.
2. Copy only the files \"temeria_heavy_knight__b1_n.dds\" and \"temeria_heavy_knight__M.dds\" into the \"data/textures/armors/HedgeKnight\" folder and overwrite the existing files.
